student.summary: Here’s a quick summary of today’s lessons: You’ll reinforce core fraction–decimal skills, practice sentence structure with interactive prompts, and explore habitats in life science. Estimated time: 35–45 minutes.

lessons.title: Fractions to Decimals
lessons.description: Convert common fractions to decimals and percentages using number lines and grids.

lessons.title: Sentence Building
lessons.description: Identify subjects and predicates; then rewrite run-on sentences with proper punctuation.

lessons.title: Habitats & Adaptations
lessons.description: Explore how animals adapt to desert, forest, and ocean biomes through short videos.

plans.title: Fractions to Decimals
plans.summary: Convert fractions into decimals with number lines and grid models to build intuition.

plans.title: Sentence Building
plans.summary: Reinforce subjects and predicates through quick writing prompts and peer review.

plans.title: Habitats & Adaptations
plans.summary: Explore biome adaptations using short videos and a gallery walk activity.
